value: Preprocessed head–modifier pairs extracted from the Zoroastrian Middle Persian Corpus and Dictionary (MPCD) for analyses of Ezafe marking and head directionality
Data must be downloaded from MPCD website; this repository contains only preprocessed pairs
Extracted 8,019 head–modifier pairs; filtered for clear NP boundaries; computed NP depth, modifier complexity, and context features; removed duplicates; encoded Ezafe presence and head position.

Musavi, Raha (2025). Head directionality and Ezafe in Middle Persian: Preprocessed head–modifier pairs [Computer software]. Zenodo. [https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.17722545](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.17722545)
This dataset is sufficient to replicate all analyses in the associated paper. Raw MPCD data not included due to licensing.
